function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared article downloads and access to online library resources.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among users who access shared library resources.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of individual devices, provide hand sanitizers, and regularly disinfect shared surfaces.","Technologies":"Online access management systems, contactless payment systems for access, UV sanitation devices.","People":"Library users, researchers, staff, students.","Owner":"Library management, facility administrators, researchers."}]}
